description: An aesthetic dashboard for Blackbox Exporter, featuring ICMP ping and packet loss rate monitoring.

targets.expr: avg(probe_duration_seconds{job="$job", ip="$ip", code!="ANYCAST", domestic!="true"} > 0.01 and probe_duration_seconds < 1)
avg(probe_duration_seconds{job="$job", code!="ANYCAST", ip="$ip"} > 0 and probe_duration_seconds < 1) by (code,city)
avg(probe_duration_seconds{job="$job", isp="$isp", ip="$ip"} > 0 and probe_duration_seconds < 1) by (code,city)

title: BBxPing
